name: income_statement
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool financial_statements.
Tool description: Get standardized balance sheet, income statement, and cash flow statement for global companies going back 5 years. 
API description: Get company income statement by year (ttm = Trailing Twelve Months).

All numbers in thousands.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol of the company. Defaults to 'AAPL'.
